attributes.action: Not to ask the Tory Leader to sack a Prospective Tory Candidate on his veiws regarding Enoch Powell's "Rivers of Blood" speech.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Everyone has their right to their veiws!
I like a lot of people am not against immigration regarding boosting the economy etc & a lot of immigrants are hard workers & pay taxes as I do, but when the country is already bursting at the seams, it’s got to stop. The widespread immigration is crippling the NHS, Housing System, schools & raping the country of benefits that all British people have worked for & entitled to at sometime in their live when disaster strikes. Enoch Powell did not ask for the immigrants to be deported, he asked to close the gates to stop more entering the country. There has been talk of the points system as used in Australia, we shouldn’t be talking about it we should put the system in place!
